attributes.action: Legalise medical cannabis in Scotland;allow 4 plants 18 seedlings 24 oz medicine
attributes.additional_details:
Granny Storm Crow's List 2015
University of Toronto
Harvard Medical School
JAMA
Raphael Mechoulam Ph.D Hebrew University, Jerusalem
Rick Simpson
A quarter million citizens who signed the petition to legalise cannabis
attributes.background: Thousands are suffering, while our government tells us cannabis has no medicinal value.  GW Pharma, supported by the UK gov grows 60 tonnes a year.  It obviously has medicinal value.  Cannabis is medicine.  Legalise it immediately.
